name: Belgian Alliance for Sustainable Palm Oil
goal:
The mission of BASP is ‘to increase awareness among members, and companies in general, regarding sustain-able palm oil, by encouraging members to use 100% sustainable palm oil and/or encouraging, guiding and supporting members to the highest level of sustainability (“segregated”)’.

It does so, among other things, by:
- Promoting use of certified sustainable palm oil
- Striving for an environment that is favorable for the uptake of sustainable palm oil
- Promoting science-based debate
- Creating synergies with other alliances that promote sustainable palm oil
- Recruiting members that can cooperate to achieve this objective
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives:
- EU Deforestation Action Plan
- RED II
- EU FTA with Indonesia and Malaysia
- International cooperation and development (including public-private partnerships for development and SDGs)
